theme_summary: Berzerker is a Beautiful Dark Theme with Chrome and silver accents.. Berzerker was inspired by Vikings they call the Berserkr. I created this theme for the world famous CM Theme engine, its compatible with CM12, CM12.1, and Cm13.
theme_long_summary:
Berzerker is a Beautiful Dark Theme with Chrome and silver accents.. Berzerker was inspired by Vikings they call the Berserkr. I created this theme for the world famous CM Theme engine, its compatible with CM12, CM12.1, and Cm13. This is for the CyanogenMod CM Theme Engine.

I will update Berzerker with the latest commits as CyanogenMod makes them available , that way we can all have a best user experience.. I do run my themes myself and will keep them updated and will continually add more as I theme new apps.. Big Thank you, to Google, XDA, and CyanogenMod for their pursuit to give us the best of Android

☆ IMORTANT☆

Please enable Night/Dark Theme in apps that have the option, I theme many apps that use day/night or dark/light theme options.

If you are using a custom theme, you should apply the stock theme, reboot then apply my theme and reboot at least once. 
Confirmed Working On - DU, AOSiP, AICP, RR, Bliss, Pure Nexus, EOS, Exodus, Temasek 5.0 thru 6.0.1 and CM12 thru 13

Please uninstall the CM12.1 version before installing this new CM13 version. ; )

Berzerker includes over 140 dark themed apps and over 200 matching icons

☆New to Berzerker☆

Take a peek at all the apps I include and any new changes I make below

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Z2SP3RBLhow1uDQpyiWKk4fVE2A8VIwe3rUAj1oF0js/edit?usp=sharing

My themes are compatible with the TBO n Theme Ready apps from djdarkknight, DaveyAnnihilation, Train88 and the whole TBO Team. Check em out, and dont be scared of the dark.
http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/apps-themeable-hangouts-layers-cmte-t3113192
For My Berzerker Keyboards

*Please check Holo White or Blue for my Berzerker Keyboard..
*Please check Material light or Dark for my Material Dark Keyboard

theme_summary: Biohazard is an elegant dark theme with minimal red touch
theme_long_summary:
Biohazard is an elegant dark theme with minimal red touch.
This theme support Layers (RRO), Substratum (OMS) & Substratum Legacy (RRO) and Cyanogen ThemeEngine (CMTE) in one package.
If you don't know the terms above then this one is not for you, please read and research first before proceed to installing.

Themed apps currently are:
Android Framework, Audio FX, Browser, Calculator, Camera, Catlog, CellBroadcast, Contacts, DeskClock, Dialer, DocumentsUI, DiskInfo, Development, Eleven, Email, ES Explorer, Gallery, Gmail, Google Camera, Google Contacts, Google DeskClock, Google Dialer, Google Drive, Google Hangout, Google Keep, Google Keyboard, Google Messenger, Google Photos, Google PlayMusic, Google PlayStore, Google Plus, Google Settings, Google Translate, Inbox, JuiceSSH, Kernel Adiutor, Keyboard, Launcher3, Messaging, Package Installer, PackageViewer, Softkey, Settings, Subtratum, SuperSU, SystemUI, Telecom and more.

Please use the Google+ community here https://goo.gl/BJHxg4 for bug report, issue or suggestion.

theme_summary: BSC is a dark theme developed for the Theme Engine from CyanogenMod CM12.It does work on CM13 as well.
theme_long_summary:
BSC is a dark theme developed for the Theme Engine from CyanogenMod CM12.It does work on CM13 as well.
Black and chrome accents throughout most core apps as well as future additions.

Theme has been tested on these ROMs:
CM12
CM13
Bliss Pop 
Validus
Temasek
Dirty Unicorns
Exodus
EOS
AOSIP
Pure Nexus
Resurrection Remix
Screw'd

I have included aspects from other ROM's

****BSC doesn't work well with CM's Dialer (Tru Caller) or any other non Google/AOSP dialers!!!!!!*****

YOU NEED TO BE ROOTED AND RUNNING A ROM THAT HAS THE CYANOGENMOD THEME ENGINE INCLUDED!!!!! THIS THEME IS FOR CM12 AND LIMITED CM13 ROMS ONLY!!!!!!

THIS IS BUILT ON STOCK DPI...ISSUES COULD ARISE DEPENDENT ON WHAT CUSTOM DPI YOU USE!!!!


Please note:
Given CM13 and its theme engine are still WIP, some issues may be experienced. 
Also,due to some limitations with Theme Engine , some elements are not themable or are not ideal for a dark UI due to how they are coded. 
Currently the following issues exist:

- Advanced Reboot menu - second menu not themed - CM12 issue


INSTALLATION
If a fresh theme install
1. Install the app
2. Go to Settings -> Themes -> Styles
3. Select BSC2
4. Apply it
5. Reboot your device!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THIS IS IMPORTANT !!!!!!!!!!!

I RECOMMEND EITHER REVERTING TO STOCK THEME PRIOR TO UPDATING THEME OR ON A ROM UPDATE OR UNINSTALLING FIRST,THEN INSTALLING THEME!!!!!!

***For optimal results with Google Plus ,Gmail , YouTube and Hangouts and Google Photos , I recommend grabbing the TBO Themable zip package from daveyannihilation,djdarkknight96 and Train88 as these versions are modified for themes such as BSC.********* 
http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/apps-themeable-hangouts-layers-cmte-t3113192

Over 100 app icons included (DU,CM,Google, etc) to the theme as well as a shader.

List of apps themed : https://docs.google.com/document/d/13h5o7nLtvsHH_htKZToh8G1E2uJsLLy5OWxp0MaX_Y0/edit?usp=sharing

More apps and additions are planned for future updates.......

Looking for an iconpack made to match this theme?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jayrod.bsc.iconpack

theme_summary: welcome to dark material // akzent, a new version of dark material with dark material colors as accents! To use the colors, install Arcus: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pixkart.arcus
theme_long_summary:
welcome to dark material // akzent, a new version of dark material with dark material colors as accents!
To use the colors, install Arcus: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pixkart.arcus

ATTENTION: If you're on MM6.0 with CMTE (CM13, DU) AND you dirty flash, MAKE SURE YOU REVERT STOCK THEME BEFORE YOU UPDATE. Or you SHOULD expect at most THREE soft reboots before your phone works again! This is due to dirty flash theme recompiles that get corrupt (CM side).

INTRODUCTION
Welcome to the first and original dark material UI available for the CyanogenMod 12/13 Theme Engine. With this theme, you can grasp that Lollipop Material look whilst not blinding your eyes as you enjoy all the eyecandy animations!

WHY DARK MATERIAL?
To understand why this theme doesn't follow Google's traditional Material Dark design with dark teal and/or blue grey, I will briefly explain.

This theme wasn't based on Google's Material Style, but was mainly influenced by the Tinted Status Bar mod's results, where it completely made the action bar into one fused item. I really liked this design, which made the system more minimal as it had two layers to look at, rather than 3 (Action Bar Primary, Action Bar Primary Dark (status bar darkened color) and the fragment layer (the interacting area)). The fact that I named this theme Dark Material over Material Dark was because I wanted to depict a dark, physical metamorphic rock - slate, and it's color. As the color scheme of this theme is mainly dark (black, grey and white text), I added the word Dark in front of my interpretation of Material hence the title Dark Material. Themes that follow Google's Material Dark, should show up as Material Dark to ensure consistency (see Google keyboard settings for reference).

NOTES FROM US, TO YOU.
Please contact me directly before posting a review, I would be infinitely grateful! :)

For direct contact with the team, please join our Google+ community! We're not scary!: https://plus.google.com/communities/104086528025432169285

IMPORTANT INFORMATION
- MAINTAINER: This theme is maintained by Nicholas, email/xda link is linked below. 
- SUGGESTION: Once you apply the theme. Perform a reboot! Any FC's, just reboot again.
- SUGGESTION: If you want to learn how to theme, check out my thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/themes/guide-getting-started-theming-cm12-t3006339
- SUGGESTION: If you are on a ROM with an icon that is not themed inside Settings, email me.
- PROBLEM: Nova Launcher v4.0 users, please set your card background to black or else you will have black on black text.


BUGS
- POPULAR: SystemUI/Notification Drawer not themed? This is a CM12 problem. Follow these instructions to fix: http://youtu.be/MW1UsCyOidY thanks to Manuel and Will.
- REQUEST: Any other bugs, contact me (Nicholas) directly. Do not leave a bad rating if your bug is easily solvable.

REQUIREMENTS
- Must have a CM12/CM12.1/13 ROM with Theme Engine installed.

WHAT IS THEMED?
We have over 211 app/system overlays, but if you want to know exactly what is themed, take a look at the list under WHAT IS THEMED? on this page: http://goo.gl/yAzPPT

ALL OTHER INFORMATION
FIRMWARES SUPPORTED: CM12 (100%), CM12.1 (100%), CM13 (100%)
ROMS WITH ICONS: CM, Cyanogen OS, BlissPop (Bleeding edge updates). Temasek, Fusion, Candy5, CyanideL, LiquidSmooth, Euphoria OS, Team OSE, EOS, AICP, CRDroid, Validus, Nameless, Carbon, Flex OS, Dirty Unicorns (#DUCertified), PAC-ROM, Benzo, OwnROM, Exodus and ResurrectionRemix.

Metadata ID for Arcus: 105739351821425192942

All the icons are made with pixel perfection and are of high quality. Attention to the minute details has given carefully.
Dark Matter supports roms like CM 13, Dirty Unicorns, AOSIP, Resurrection Remix, AICP etc.

ARCUS

You need to have CM12 or CM13 or a rom installed on your phone which supports CM theme engine in order to use this theme.

theme_summary: DarkMTRL CM12 is a dark theme developed for the Theme Engine from CyanogenMod CM12. It is based on the original concept by the author when Android 5.0 was launched, featuring inverted dark components and blue grey accents and highlights.
theme_long_summary:
DarkMTRL CM12 is a dark theme developed for the Theme Engine from CyanogenMod CM12.


It is based on the original concept by the author when Android 5.0 was launched, featuring inverted dark components and blue grey accents and highlights.


Important for CM12s/CyanogenOS users
Updated flashable zip for CM12s to accompany the theme (ROOT USERS ONLY)
https://plus.google.com/+PatrickLoth/posts/bJeTUbgorJR


Known issues:
• Advanced Reboot menu - second menu not themed - CM12 issue

theme_summary: Be on the dark side of Android with this beautiful Lollipop material dark theme. Starting as a little modification, mainly created for the custom rom BlissPop, this theme has grown up to a stand-alone CM12 theme, usable for every kind of device running CyanogenMod 12.
theme_long_summary:
### [tut] how to fix systemUI FC's
TO EVERYONE WHO GOT SYSTEM UI - FC - Here you ll know how to fix it in under 2 minutes without losing any personal data!!!


https://youtu.be/WOz68ti0z5I

Be on the dark side of Android with this beautiful Lollipop material dark theme.

Starting as a little modification, mainly created for the custom rom BlissPop, this theme has grown up to a stand-alone CM12 theme, usable for every kind of device running CyanogenMod 12.

This theme is the overhauled version of my well-known cm12 theme DEEP DARKNESS // - it comes with compatibility to the newest custom-rom commits and features and let the original style of DEEP DARKNESS // shine in a new polished way! - To be able to stay on the old style of DEEP DARKNESS // I decided to create this makeover as a stand-alone variant instead of updating the original theme.

This theme got severall different color-schemes included. You need to download Arcus to be able to build these variants.

♦ Download Arcus: https://goo.gl/ehq05B

IF INSTALL FAILS, please check this:
https://youtu.be/FQAbXXMFAU4


CyanogenMod 12/13 theme engine is required to use this theme.

theme_summary: DOMINATION is a brilliant dark theme with black backgrounds and darker than stock Material colours for action bar, status bar and accents. The way that Google should have made Material Design #WhiteUIMustDie!
theme_long_summary:
DOMINATION is a brilliant dark theme with black backgrounds and darker than stock Material colours for action bar, status bar and accents. The way that Google should have made Material Design #whiteuimustdie !
ATTENTION: THIS THEME REQUIRES THEME READY GOOGLE APPS!!!

You must be also be running a Marshmallow (Android 6.0 +) ROM that has support for CMTE for this app to work.

THIS THEME IS NOW OPEN SOURCED! https://github.com/daveyannihilation/DominationCMTE

Most items in the apps listed below should be themed on devices ranging from hdpi - xxxhdpi however some items may not be, depending on the ROM you're running. Please take a screen shot of any items that aren't themed and chat with me on Hangouts at davidwilson1683@gmail.com or join the Google Plus community here: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/114545910765709545138

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:

1 - Download & install the app
2 - Open Themes app (or single press the Themes tile on certain ROMs)
3 - Click on Domination
4 - If your ROM doesn't have the Themes tile, then in the Themes app select Style, Status bar and Navigation bar
5 - Click the Apply button down below them
6 - Make sure you do a full reboot and enjoy your new dark ui when it reboots back into Android :)

WHAT'S CURRENTLY THEMED

Browser
Calculator
CellBroadcast
Chrome
Chrome Beta
Chrome Dev
Chromium
cLock
Contacts
DeskClock
Dialer
DocumentsUI
Drive
DU About
DU Certified
DU Tweaks
DU Updater
Email
Framework - See note below for other options
Gallery
Gmail*
GoogleApp*
GoogleCalculator
GoogleClock
GoogleContacts*
GoogleDialer*
GoogleKeyboard
GooglePackageInstaller
GooglePlus*
Hangouts*
Inbox (recommend flashing TBO version for better theming)
JuiceSSH
Keep
LatinIME
Launcher3
MediaProvider
Messaging
Messenger
Mms**
NovaLauncher
PackageInstaller
Photos*
PlayMusic
PlayStore
Settings - See note below for other options
SuperSU
SystemUI
Telecom
TeleService
Themes
YouTube*


*Please note - There are a number of apps which are not compatible with themes due to hard coded text and background colours. There is a thread on xda-developers which has a number of different flashable zips made by #TeamBlackOut that allow some of those apps to be compatible with themes. The thread can be found here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/apps-themeable-hangouts-layers-cmte-t3113192

**Please note - AOSP source-built Mms is not completely theme ready unless some items in the code are changed. I have made a flashable zip which can be found here: https://www.androidfilehost.com/?fid=24052804347853343
I have also made a number of commits which can be found here: https://github.com/RobbieL811/packages_apps_Mms/commits/lp5.0-caf
There are 5 commits in total, the first of which is dated the 17th of February 2015 and titled Mms themeing fix. To have Mms fully themed, kindly ask your friendly ROM developer to add those commits into their source to ensure full Mms themeability.

Other Options: While CMTE doesn't natively allows for different options to be selected when installing a theme, there is an awesome app named Arcus which can be found here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pixkart.arcus&hl=en

This app allows for different versions of the theme to be installed, and I will list them below:

Accent Blue
Accent BlueGrey
Accent Green
Accent LightBlue
Accent Lime
Accent Orange
Accent Red
Accent Teal
Accent White
Accent Yellow
Background AllBlack (this will only work with the standard Accent)
Background DarkGrey (this will only work with the standard Accent)
Settings NoCards (this will only work with the standard Accent)

I have had a huge amount of help in making this app, and I want to thank everyone for everything they've done for me. You know who you are and you know how much I appreciate it. Enjoy and happy theming!

theme_summary: A theme with non flat glowing blue icons and cool backgrounds
theme_long_summary:
Glow CM12/13 theme is designed to work with the Cyanogenmod theme engine.
Glow is a unique combination of dark accents and the cool blue with realistic buttons with awesome glow effect. It is first of a kind with textured background and certain systemui elements. We have added glow icons for the launcher so that your homescreen matches the overall look.


**old font and navbar icons are available through arcus


Whats in the package

theme_summary: A theme with non flat, glowing green icons and cool backgrounds
theme_long_summary:
Glow Green CM12 theme is designed to work with the Cyanogenmod theme engine.
It also works on almost all cm derivatives like Blisspop,euphoria,candy5,Resurrection Remix,validus etc.

Glow Green is an addition to our Glow themes series.

Glow is a unique combination of dark accents and green color, with realistic buttons having awesome glow effect. It is first of a kind with textured background in certain systemui elements. We have added glow icons for the launcher so that your home screen matches the overall look. Glow green also consists of unique glowing sliders system wide.

theme_summary: Night Sky is a dark theme developed for the Theme Engine from CyanogenMod CM12.It does work on CM13 as well.
theme_long_summary:
Night Sky is a dark theme developed for the Theme Engine from CyanogenMod CM12.It does work on CM13 as well.
Blue accents throughout most core apps as well as future additions.

Theme has been tested on these ROMs:
CM12 SHOULD WORK STILL

CM13
Dirty Unicorns

HAVE NOT TESTED BUT SHOULD WORK 
Bliss Pop 
Validus
Temasek
AOSIP
Resurrection Remix
Screw'd

I have included aspects from other ROM's

****Night Sky doesn't work well with CM's Dialer (Tru Caller) or any other non Google/AOSP dialers!!!!!!*****

YOU NEED TO BE ROOTED AND RUNNING A ROM THAT HAS THE CYANOGENMOD THEME ENGINE INCLUDED!!!!! THIS THEME IS FOR CM12 AND LIMITED CM13 ROMS ONLY!!!!!!

THIS IS BUILT ON STOCK DPI...ISSUES COULD ARISE DEPENDENT ON WHAT CUSTOM DPI YOU USE!!!!


Please note:
Given CM13 and its theme engine are still WIP, some issues may be experienced. 
Also,due to some limitations with Theme Engine , some elements are not themable or are not ideal for a dark UI due to how they are coded. 
Currently the following issues exist:

INSTALLATION
If a fresh theme install
1. Install the app
2. Go to Settings -> Themes -> Styles
3. Select Night Sky
4. Apply it
5. Reboot your device!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THIS IS IMPORTANT !!!!!!!!!!!

I RECOMMEND EITHER REVERTING TO STOCK THEME PRIOR TO UPDATING THEME OR ON A ROM UPDATE OR UNINSTALLING FIRST,THEN INSTALLING THEME!!!!!!

***For optimal results with Google Plus ,Gmail , YouTube and Hangouts and Google Photos , I recommend grabbing the TBO Themable zip package from daveyannihilation,djdarkknight96 and Train88 as these versions are modified for themes such as BSC.********* 
http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/apps-themeable-hangouts-layers-cmte-t3113192

Over 100 app icons included (DU,CM,Google, etc) to the theme as well as a shader.

List of apps themed : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QnT0m7-IZkp6619NMeRC9a_rZPyTC21FquJThUuwKBw/edit

More apps and additions are planned for future updates.......

AS THIS IS BASED ON MY OTHER THEME BSC , SOME APPS STILL HAVE THE CHROME ICONS ETC FROM BSC. THESE WILL BE UPDATED TO MATCH THE REMAINDER OF THE THEME

The Road is unique theme, which will please the people who like to be on the roads and who like to travel a lot. From backgrounds to icons, these theme has been designed to remind you about the epic journeys you had.
Please keep in mind that this theme works with cm12/12.1 and its derivatives only.
AICP, Resurrection Remix, Euphoria, Blisspop, Exodus etc are fully supported.
